Cleaning up history db, deleting records before timestamp: %s. Cleaning up spam db, deleting %s records before timestamp: %s". Resolved url: %s Time cost: %s milliseconds. Parsed %s rules. Adding %s numbers to spam db. Number list is empty, nothing to import. Importing %s numbers as regex rule. Creating rule with %s numbers. Replacing the rule with description: %s. Rule with description %s not found. Merging the rule with description: %s. Regex count before: %s, after: %s. Replacing number from %s to %s. Found %s rules with description %s. Modifying %s rules. The number %s doesn\'t match the filter %s, skip. Failed to detect country code. Identified as spam number, category: %s. Identified as valid number, category: %s. Unidentified number. The permission READ_PHONE_STATE is required for detecting country code. - {cc}
  The country code.
- {domestic}
  The domestic part.
- {number}
  The full number, including both country code and domestic part, without leading + or 0s.
- {origin_number}
  The origin number that can contain leading + or 0s.
- {year}
  The year, e.g.: 2024
- {month} {day}
  Single-digit number will be padded with leading zero, e.g.:
  {month}_{day} -> 01_02
- {month_index} {day_index}
  These values will be padded without leading zero, e.g.:
  {month}_{day} -> 1_2
Supported tags:

%s
%s PhoneBlock(Test) üá©üá™ üåê Currently in testing with testing API, it will transition to the production API in the next release v4.0.

Testing and production accounts are not compatible, please register again after switching to production later.

Currently, it\'s for German users, with potential for global expansion.

Website: https://phoneblock.net/pb-test/api/ Register an account on https://phoneblock.net/pb-test/api/ to get your username and password. Then, fill them in below.

They should look like:
- Username:
  xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
- Password:
  xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx The call screening time limit is 5 seconds, with a %s ms buffer for the inaccuracy of time functions, the total time limit is actually %s ms. The previous steps cost %s ms, not enough time left, skip. Filter Spam Generate a list of numbers containing the spam number identified from the previous step, and ready to be imported to the database. Another thread is cancelled.> Username> Password> Swipe left to delete it.

Most card-like UI elements in this app are associated with swiping gestures, some of which also support swiping right, for example, the history records. > If this is a valid number, please report it on github.> Skip alpha or empty number.>
